data.name: FadingLight
data.description:
A post-war nuclear explosion has trapped you, an experienced nuclear engineer, in a dark antiworld that circulates from 12-6 am. Armed only with a faint flashlight and antimatter collector, you have to generate enough energy and hold on till the first sight of the morning light.
 
Hurry, but be careful, it's rumored that you are not alone...
 
ADVENTURE: There you are, finally awake, feeling dizzy. What happened? Where are you? Embark on a chilling horror journey through confusion and fear.
 
SURVIVE: It's rumored that unknown entity is waiting for you in the dark. While avoiding itâ€™s hunting, think, act, and escape...or die trying. This will be a battle of wits and courage.
 
COLLECT: Collecting the antimatters in pairs will generate enough energy to repel the mysterious enemy. But when will it come? Or has it been around you all the time?
 
IMMERSIVE: Realistic graphics and sounds provide you with a truly immersive experience that will keep your adrenaline pumping.
